title: What was the biggest selling album of the 90s? - Quora

response.answer_text: This following website seemed to have a more direct answer. It listed five of the bestselling guitar-driven albums of the 1990's. So… here goes… According to Reverb.com: ARTIST / ALBUM / YEAR RELEASED / ALBUMS SOLD WORLDWIDE: (1) Nirvana / “Nevermind” / 1991 / 30 million; (2) Metallica / “Metallica” / 1991 / 28 million; (3) Whitney Houston / “The Bodyguard” / 1992 / 28 million; (4) Alanis Morissette / “Jagged Little Pill” / 1995 / 33 million; (5) Santana / “Supernatural” / 1999 / 21 million. I hope this helps. Rock on! Fin.
